Please introduce links to this page from related articles. *(December 2025)* **Hay Group Global Research Center for Strategy Execution** is the first global research center on Strategy Execution of [Hay Group](/wiki/Hay_Group). Established in October 2008 in Singapore, it leads research activities and coordinates [Hay Group](/wiki/Hay_Group)'s global research networks located in [Paris](/wiki/Paris), [SÃ£o Paulo](/wiki/S%C3%A3o_Paulo), [Frankfurt](/wiki/Frankfurt), [Boston](/wiki/Boston) and [London](/wiki/London). The center also receives supports from the [Singapore Economic Development Board](/wiki/Singapore_Economic_Development_Board). ## History The center is set up under [Hay Group](/wiki/Hay_Group)'s Building Effective Organizations (BEO) practice and supported by [Singapore Economic Development Board](/wiki/Singapore_Economic_Development_Board) as part of a national effort to establish a global hub for organizational effectiveness and excellence. Its opening is mentioned in Singapore Senior Minister [Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong)'s speech in the Singapore Human Capital Summit 2008. Established back in 2008 as the Global BEO R&D center, its activities were officially launched in 2009 under the leadership of Dr. Andreas Raharso as its [Dean](/wiki/Dean_(education)) (Director). Later in 2009, it was renamed as Global R&D center for Strategy Execution. The center is currently based at [Keppel](/wiki/Keppel_Corporation) Tower in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). ## Research Hay Group Global R&D Center for Strategy Execution conducts numerous research on a range of business topics which includes: [Mergers and Acquisitions](/wiki/Mergers_and_acquisitions), [Family Owned Business](/wiki/Family_business), Role of [Corporate Center](/wiki/Corporate_headquarters), [Strategic Performance Management](/wiki/Strategic_management) and Culture Transformation. It also hosts and presents at global conferences for academic and practitioner leaders, including: - Chair the [plenary session](/wiki/Plenary_session) in the annual international conference of [Strategic Management Society](/wiki/Strategic_Management_Society) in [Rome](/wiki/Rome), September 2010 on the topic: "Strategy Execution: Eastern Perspective on Self Organization". - Co-chair the special conference of [Strategic Management Society](/wiki/Strategic_Management_Society) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), June 2012 on the topic: "Globalization Of Innovation Strategies: Novel Moves for a Global Game". - Official website
